divs: sighting detailsi was at a friend's house, we were all sober. someone pointed and said 'what is that?' it was low and fast. the location is on the flight path to o hare, it was not a plane or helicopter but a bright 'ball' heading east to lake mich. it made a slight correction to south\southeat. my 1st thot was it was going to explode as i thot it was on fire and i was anxious about loss of life. another guy thot it was on fire too. most of the witnesses thot it was 'glowing' from a power source and not on fire (there were about 10 of us) one person thot it was a weather balloon but admitted he never saw one before. most felt it was not but couldn't give a better explanation. most thot 'ufo'. we all kinda kept looking up after that. we could see it for approx 6 seconds before it was out of sight. maybe it was longer, we were all kinda stunned.it was lower than a plane, silent and faster than a plane would have been visible. trying to understand what i was seeing was very confusing. i've always wanted to see a ufo and wondered what my response would be. in the short time span i was concerned about it exploding but it remained under 'control'. i followed it out to the street when it was done passing over, thinking maybe i could see more of it but it was gone.
Summary: about 10 of us observed it, moving purposefully and fast for about 6 seconds
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There was one other sighting in Chicago on or around September 4th 2011
